title: σ-Hole, lone-pair-hole, and π-hole site-based interactions in aerogen-comprising complexes: a comparative study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22408-22417
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03614J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mahmoud A. A. Ibrahim, Hassan A. A. Abuelliel, Nayra A. M. Moussa, Al-shimaa S. M. Rady, Shaban R. M. Sayed, Mohamed A. El-Tayeb, Muhammad Naeem Ahmed, Mohamed Khaled Abd El-Rahman, Tamer Shoeib
σ-, lp-, and π-hole site-based interactions within the ZO3/ZF2⋯NH3 and ⋯NCH complexes (where Z = Ar, Kr, and Xe) were studied using various ab initio computations.
